/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly gray and white, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
